name: 4-methylthiobutanaldoxime,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (adding cysteine)
definition: 4-Methylthiobutanaldoxime + L-Cysteine + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> S-(4-Methylthiobutylthiohydroximoyl)-L-cysteine + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 2 H2O
